titles: A reply to the excellent and elegant speech made by Sir Thomas Player, the worthy Chamberlain of London, to the Right Honble the Lord Mayor &c. on Friday the 12th of September, 1679 by H.B.
author: H. B.
Player, Thomas, Sir, d. 1686.
notes: Published also under title: An answer to the excellent and elegant speech made by Sir Thomas Player.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
